channel.title: Journey in iOS Development Series on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in Journey in iOS Development Series on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Journey in iOS Development Series – In the Beginning…
item.description: Today I’m starting a series related to my journey in learning to develop iOS apps. As lightbulbs come on for me, I plan to write up what I’m learning, if nothing else for my own reference. But I do hope my readers enjoy the discoveries I make along the way. These first few blogs will be somewhat autobiographical, so hopefully I don’t bore you to death. I’ll try and make them quick.
